label: 判元見届人
見出し読み: はんもとみとどけにん
説明文: Brokers, who used their specialized information networks to recruit women, and acted as guarantors of their contracts.#[article]Takebayashi Hiroe. Form and Function of Contracts for Common Prostitutes in the Late Edo Period: Koriyama and Motomiya in the Nihonmatsu Domain.
